sentences.en: Each Sunday, Rooney delivered one of his "60 Minutes" essays from behind a desk that he, an expert woodworker, hewed himself.
sentences.cn: 每周日，鲁尼都准时出现在《60分钟》短评节目里，坐在那张身为专业木工的他为自己量身制作的桌子后面。

sentences.en: Our own woodworker department guarantees the professional timber production quality.
sentences.cn: 我们自已的木工部门确保木材生产质量的专业.

sentences.en: Recalling the talented woodworker, the finest tools are useless without the creative application of a trained and talented artisan.
sentences.cn: 回到前面的木工身上，如果没有天赋和相关的培训，最好的工具也没有用处。

sentences.en: While it may seem harmless for the weekend woodworker to crack open a beer (or six) while working on a project, avoid the temptation until you're finished with the woodworking.
sentences.cn: 虽然说，在周末木工边干活边喝几瓶啤酒看起来是没关系的，但是在你干完活之前，都要抵制这样的诱惑。

trans.tran_cn: 木工（指木匠，细木工或家具木工）
trans.tran_en: a person who works in wood, such as a carpenter, joiner, or cabinet-maker
